data.title: Sustainability Hub Norway (S-HUB) on LinkedIn: #shubsummit
data.meta_description:
üôè Thank you to all the essential contributors making S-HUB Summit 2024 happen this week! From behind the scenes ‚Äì to centre stage! üåü 

A special thanks to‚Ä¶ | 14 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
I had a moment last night. A moment that has resulted from hundreds of thousands of moments. We won the ESG Project of the Year for MindSeed at the Digital Finance Function Awards from the team at GENCFO Community Our vision is for SMEs to be at the forefront of sustainable business practices, driving growth, enhancing team well-being, and protecting our environment. We aim for a future where sustainability is ingrained in every business decision, leading to enduring success and a healthier planet. To make this happen I believe it's truly only possible with a human-led, tech-enabled proposition. MindSeed is our tech enabler. I'm super proud of this award, partly because I still have to google how to do an xlookup üòÇ, but mainly because of the team of people who have contributed to this over the past four years. I want to give a specific shout-out to Atomic Innovation our tech strategy partners who have supported me since year 1 - translating my vision into something practical. No mean feat. They are an amazing innovative & resilient tech organisation (with a female co-founder ü•≥)- connect with them. Thanks to Christopher Argent for creating the opportunity. Huge congrats to my fellow nominees Dr. Michael Goerz from Siemens Energy and Sandhya Sriram from Narayana Health keep flying the flag to a brighter future üß° SMEs remember that you can have it all, you need to find the right guidance to make it happen. #femalefounders #techforgood #financeleadership

Sustainability Tech at Deep Tech Innovation Alley! Sustainability is strategic imperative for any forward-thinking company today. Hence, we have a power packed panel discussion as part of the Deep Tech Innovation Alley. The theme is about Sustainability Tech: Achieve Net Zero and ESG Goals. Moderated by the distinguished SustainTech Leader, Madhavan Satagopan, this session promises to bring forth deep insights and innovative solutions. Our Esteemed Panelists are : Vijay Sethi: Sustainability Evangelist & Former CIO at Hero Motors Sunila Sahasrabudhe: Head of ESG at Biocon Chhaya Sehgal: CEO & Founder at The Winning Edge The panelists will share their wealth of expertise, discuss the intersection of technology and sustainability, and delve into strategies for achieving Net Zero and ESG goals. It's a unique opportunity to gain invaluable insights from leaders driving change in the sustainability tech landscape. Stay tuned for a thought-provoking discussion that will shape the future of sustainability in the tech industry. Let's chart a course towards a greener, more sustainable tomorrow! #SustainabilityTech #ESGGoals #DeepTechInnovationAlley #TechLeadership #InnovationForGood #networkscience

In designing the inaugural Systemic Investing Summit, our ambition was to create an experience that would last into the aftermath of the conference proper. That‚Äôs why we used the mental model of an ‚ÄúAction Forum‚Äù for guiding the design of the agenda, focusing on building relationships and seeding collaborations. That doesn‚Äôt mean that there wasn‚Äôt any ‚Äúreal work‚Äù done at the Summit. Activities such as listening to other people talk about their work, building new relationships, and exploring a wide array of ideas are just as critical in the process of forging collaborations as the more technical work around planning projects, forming coalitions, and soliciting commitments. But we‚Äôre cognizant that most conferences leave it up to serendipity whether or not actual collaboration between participants will happen once the closing bell at the conference has rung. This is why the TransCap Initiative is going to actively incubate, accelerate, or elevate many of the ideas that have come out of the Summit.

üìäVenture capital is the best-performing asset class of the past 25 years. VC can also drive massive significant social and environmental benefits. ‚Üó The trend in Europe is promising: Climate investment in Europe has tripled to more than $20bn in 2023 over the past three years and sustained its growth in 2023, bucking the trend of overall VC investment. üíö For catalysing step-change innovations in technology that can tackle the world‚Äôs biggest challenges we need more funding from institutional investors into venture. More on how we could achieve this and the value of diversity in the 4th Flagship Report of European Women in VC: "BEYOND RETURNS: Venture and growth investing fuel sustainability & societal change" with Founders Forum Group Forum and Technation. Let`s shape an impact-driven and diverse European venture capital ecosystem - happy to collaborate with üöÄKinga Stanislawska, Kasia Piasecki, Selma Meryem Peters, Marcia Maciel, and all other members of European Women in VC. Link available in comments ‚¨á #diversity #DEI #Europe #impactfunding #greentech

In the world of #ESG #DeepTech #investments access to exclusive opportunities sets Rahim Invest apart. As a Swiss ESG investment provider, Rahim Invest FO üá®üá≠ understands the level of discretion, evaluation, and due diligence required for proper investment opportunities in the DeepTech sector. We offer bespoke solutions to fast-track access to ultra-exclusive, highly profitable #ventures for elite investors from the #Gulfregion making our opportunities inaccessible through ordinary avenues. Rahim Invest specializes in high-growth sectors within ESG DeepTech, such as #BioTech #MedTech #Artificial Foods #HealthTech #SportsTech and #Longevity Technologies. These sectors are not only innovative but also have a significant positive impact on society and the environment. Our Bespoke 5-STAR Approach üèÜ We honour and value the time of our exclusive Gulf region investors looking to expand or diversify their portfolios with valuable ventures in ESG DeepTech. For those seeking to create impact, add value, or explore new avenues while safely engaging in new #sustainable opportunities, Rahim Invest carefully selects opportunities that match our clients' business preferences for projects promising substantial returns and exclusive benefits, saving their valuable time and resources. üèÜ Unlock High-Level Exclusive Opportunities with Rahim Invest üèÜ At Rahim Invest, we don't compete with other #institutionalinvestors ; we cooperate with them, opening doors to the elite decision-makers world and HNWIs with impressive profiles from the Gulf region. It's a #winwin #strategy for all participants. We unlock access to #ultrahighprofit projects for our Gulf region investors through Rahim Invest‚Äôs cooperation agreements with a global network of #privateequity & #venturecapital funds and #privatebanks Our investors gain access to investments, opportunities, and strategic partners operating within the global top tier. They discover highly discreet projects and investment ventures not available to the general market, yet representing true value, prestige, and highly attractive returns in the ESG DeepTech sector.
